shake({u1:0, u2:0, count:0, u3:0, u4:1, aplitude:0, speed:1});

ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:20}); // {Cloud}
“That's just the way it is {Tifa}.
It was their choice to make.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:22}); // {Cloud}
“I'm…a coward.
I don't even have the guts
to call it quits here.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:29}); // {Cloud}
“Don't worry.
It'll be okay.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:30}); // {Cloud}
“I'll make a big enough
ruckus for everyone.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:31}); // {Cloud}
“Besides, I'm the pilot.”{PAUSE}“No more flying around
casually like before.”{PAUSE}“We won't have
time to feel lonely.”
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:4, type:2, adjust:0});

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:58}); // {Cloud}
“Forget it,
I'm not even gonna read it.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:59}); // {Cloud}
“Whenever I read,
I get airsick.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:63}); // {Cloud}
“I really do understand, {Yuffie}.
When I get sick on a flight, it's a real killer.”{PAUSE}“When I was in SOLDIER,
I completely forgot about my motion sickness.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:66}); // {Cloud}
“Well, according to my research…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:67}); // {Cloud}
“First off, if you're nervous a lot,
you won't get sick.”{PAUSE}“But you can't always be nervous.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:68}); // {Cloud}
“With this much space, your best
bet is to move around
while you're riding.”{PAUSE}“It also might be a good idea to
stretch sometimes, too.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:69}); // {Cloud}
“But in SOLDIER, we spent
a lot of time in trucks.”{PAUSE}“That sucked!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:70}); // {Cloud}
“And there's one thing you mustn't do
when riding.”{PAUSE}“And that is…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:73}); // {Cloud}
“Once you get sick, there's nothing
anyone can do.”{PAUSE}“I know it's tough…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:23}); // {Tifa}
“What's wrong with me?
I guess…I'm scared.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:28}); // {Tifa}
“This airship is too big
for just the two of us.”{PAUSE}“Yeah, it's a little lonely
without everyone.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:23}); // {Tifa}
“What's wrong with me?
I guess…I'm scared.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:24}); // {Tifa}
“{Cloud}!
Say everything'll be fine!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:27}); // {Tifa}
“I don't know why, but suddenly
I feel like everything'll be fine.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:2}); // {Barret}
“Dammit! Why didn't ya tell me
you could fly an airship!?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:3}); // {Barret}
“I thought…
{Tifa} was gone for good.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:17}); // {Red XIII}
“Gramps…
Sometimes I don't know what
he's talking about.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:13}); // {Red XIII}
“Just be patient, old man.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:18}); // {Yuffie}
“I know you're all dyin' to talk
to a babe like me!”{PAUSE}“But just leave me alone.
This ship makes me…urk…!!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:62}); // {Yuffie}
“Huh?”{PAUSE}“How would you even know?
You don't know how tough
it is…getting sick on boats and rides…”{PAUSE}“So, please…just leave me alone.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:65}); // {Yuffie}
“Isn't there any way to prevent this?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:74}); // {Yuffie}
“…So you‘re a little better off
than me.”{PAUSE}“But I don't feel…well.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:48}); // {Yuffie}
“Where's the next stop?
Can't you get there any quicker?”{PAUSE}“{Cloud}, put me in your party,
so I can get off this ship.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:49}); // {Yuffie}
“Hmph!”{PAUSE}“I wonder why anyone would ever
make an airship like this…”{PAUSE}“Ugh…ugh…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:49}); // {Yuffie}
“Hmph!”{PAUSE}“I wonder why anyone would ever
make an airship like this…”{PAUSE}“Ugh…ugh…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:50}); // {Yuffie}
“What? Are we there?”{PAUSE}“I know it's all for Wutai,
But I can't take much more of this.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:51}); // {Yuffie}
“{Cloud}…urp…ugh.”{PAUSE}“You know, I was thinking…phew…
Why does Materia always have
something to do with
battles or magic?”{PAUSE}“I bet the Ancients must've always been fighting.”{PAUSE}“It must've been…ugh…terrible…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:52}); // {Yuffie}
“Are you waiting for {Cloud}?”{PAUSE}“He's flying right now, so you can't get him.”{PAUSE}“Were you going to force me
into the submarine right now?”{PAUSE}“Quit it!
If you want to go, then just leave me behind.”{PAUSE}“…ooooooh.
What're you talking about? I…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:52}); // {Yuffie}
“Are you waiting for {Cloud}?”{PAUSE}“He's flying right now, so you can't get him.”{PAUSE}“Were you going to force me
into the submarine right now?”{PAUSE}“Quit it!
If you want to go, then just leave me behind.”{PAUSE}“…ooooooh.
What're you talking about? I…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:53}); // {Yuffie}
“What's the pilot like?”{PAUSE}“Tell him {Yuffie} says if he pilots
the plane smoothly, I'll give him
my autograph…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:54}); // {Yuffie}
“Headed for…Midgar?”{PAUSE}“Uh, a, anywhere's fine…I don't care.
Just hurry up and land this thing.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:57}); // {Yuffie}
“It's a contract that says when the war is over,
all the Materia will belong to me.”{PAUSE}“It's all in there. Read it
carefully and then sign it, all right?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:60}); // {Yuffie}
“Oh yeah?”{PAUSE}“I'm the same way, so I can't say too much.”{PAUSE}“Damn! My plan failed.
Let's pick on {Red XIII} later
to let off steam.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:4}); // {Cait Sith}
“Sorry, but I had to do something
to trick the enemy.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:5}); // {Cait Sith}
“Come on! Everyone is waiting!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:36}); // {PURPLE}[ASSIST]{WHITE} to move ahead
{PURPLE}[CANCEL]{WHITE} to land
{PURPLE}[MENU]{WHITE} to call the bridge
[Directional button:up] lower altitude
[Directional button:down] raise altitude
[Directional button:left] move left
[Directional button:right] move right
{PURPLE}[PAGEUP]{WHITE} arc Left
{PURPLE}[PAGEDOWN]{WHITE} arc Right
{PURPLE}[ASSIST]{WHITE} toggle map
{PURPLE}[START]{WHITE} toggle map

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:37}); // “So things have come to this…
When you want to take off,
just tell the pilot on the bridge.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:39}); // “Working on the Highwind,
we spent every day slaving
under Heidegger.”{PAUSE}“Whenever he got yelled at
by the President, he'd immediately
take it out on the crew.”{PAUSE}“We put up with this all the time,
even when he beat us.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:40}); // “I mean, I finally made it on
the crew of the famous Highwind,
and there's no way I was going
to quit over him.”{PAUSE}“Let's see, it must've been
a week ago…it was my shift and
we were heading towards the North Cave.”{PAUSE}“Everyone, including the President
and Scarlet, got on.”{PAUSE}“And with them, I saw {Cid},
a legendary pilot!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:41}); // “And he was looking around
the inside of the ship
looking really, y'know, nostalgic…”{PAUSE}“He even talked to us.”{PAUSE}“I couldn't believe it! I was so impressed!
He was every bit as warm-hearted
as we'd always heard.”{PAUSE}“{Cid} said that
if he had the Highwind,
things would be a lot easier.”{PAUSE}“And now here we are off to save the Planet.
It's true. He really overwhelmed me.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:42}); // “And that's why we decided to help.”{PAUSE}“After the North Cave, we went to Junon,
and I started screaming 'Fire! Fire!'”{PAUSE}“In the middle of all the commotion,
we stole this ship from the Shinra.”{PAUSE}“That's how it happened.
Just a minor mutiny against our leaders.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:43}); // “But {Barret} and
you were captured
by Heidegger…”{PAUSE}“We waited seven days for a chance
to rescue you guys
before we finally could.”{PAUSE}“So thanks to our successful mission, we
were able to see you again.”{PAUSE}“I hope I didn't bore you
too much with that long story.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:14}); // Bugenhagen
“I love this smell.”{PAUSE}“Of course, I also love
the smell of nature, too…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:15}); // Bugenhagen
“Hmm? The deck's up there?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:16}); // Bugenhagen
“Then I'll be on the deck
just passing the time.”{PAUSE}“I can feel the workings of the Planet
in the smell of the wind.”{PAUSE}“I also feel the greatness of Man's
wisdom and the knowledge
in the smell of machinery…”{PAUSE}“Well, bye for now.”

“So things have come to this…
When you want to take off,
just tell the pilot on the bridge.”

“…Well…
Um, what should I talk about?”{PAUSE}“Wanna hear
why we rebelled?”{PAUSE}{CHOICE}Listen
{CHOICE}Don't care

“Working on the Highwind,
we spent every day slaving
under Heidegger.”{PAUSE}“Whenever he got yelled at
by the President, he'd immediately
take it out on the crew.”{PAUSE}“We put up with this all the time,
even when he beat us.”

“I mean, I finally made it on
the crew of the famous Highwind,
and there's no way I was going
to quit over him.”{PAUSE}“Let's see, it must've been
a week ago…it was my shift and
we were heading towards the North Cave.”{PAUSE}“Everyone, including the President
and Scarlet, got on.”{PAUSE}“And with them, I saw {Cid},
a legendary pilot!”

“And he was looking around
the inside of the ship
looking really, y'know, nostalgic…”{PAUSE}“He even talked to us.”{PAUSE}“I couldn't believe it! I was so impressed!
He was every bit as warm-hearted
as we'd always heard.”{PAUSE}“{Cid} said that
if he had the Highwind,
things would be a lot easier.”{PAUSE}“And now here we are off to save the Planet.
It's true. He really overwhelmed me.”

“And that's why we decided to help.”{PAUSE}“After the North Cave, we went to Junon,
and I started screaming 'Fire! Fire!'”{PAUSE}“In the middle of all the commotion,
we stole this ship from the Shinra.”{PAUSE}“That's how it happened.
Just a minor mutiny against our leaders.”

“But {Barret} and
you were captured
by Heidegger…”{PAUSE}“We waited seven days for a chance
to rescue you guys
before we finally could.”{PAUSE}“So thanks to our successful mission, we
were able to see you again.”{PAUSE}“I hope I didn't bore you
too much with that long story.”

“Huh? Don't you want
to test my memory on
how we met {Cid}?”

“I'm not just shooting the breeze!
I'm also working!”

“Oh, yeah, yeah.
Are you using Chocobos?”{PAUSE}“I mean, just loading them up
and transporting them.”

“I wonder what everyone's going to do
when this fight's over?”{PAUSE}“I wonder what's gonna happen
to the Highwind?”

{Yuffie}
“Where's the next stop?
Can't you get there any quicker?”{PAUSE}“{Cloud}, put me in your party,
so I can get off this ship.”

{Yuffie}
“Hmph!”{PAUSE}“I wonder why anyone would ever
make an airship like this…”{PAUSE}“Ugh…ugh…”

{Yuffie}
“What? Are we there?”{PAUSE}“I know it's all for Wutai,
But I can't take much more of this.”

{Yuffie}
“{Cloud}…urp…ugh.”{PAUSE}“You know, I was thinking…phew…
Why does Materia always have
something to do with
battles or magic?”{PAUSE}“I bet the Ancients must've always been fighting.”{PAUSE}“It must've been…ugh…terrible…”

{Yuffie}
“Are you waiting for {Cloud}?”{PAUSE}“He's flying right now, so you can't get him.”{PAUSE}“Were you going to force me
into the submarine right now?”{PAUSE}“Quit it!
If you want to go, then just leave me behind.”{PAUSE}“…ooooooh.
What're you talking about? I…”

{Yuffie}
“What's the pilot like?”{PAUSE}“Tell him {Yuffie} says if he pilots
the plane smoothly, I'll give him
my autograph…”

{Yuffie}
“Headed for…Midgar?”{PAUSE}“Uh, a, anywhere's fine…I don't care.
Just hurry up and land this thing.”

{Yuffie}
“{Cloud}…sign this.”

{Cloud}
“What is it?”

{Yuffie}
“It's a contract that says when the war is over,
all the Materia will belong to me.”{PAUSE}“It's all in there. Read it
carefully and then sign it, all right?”

{Cloud}
“Forget it,
I'm not even gonna read it.”

{Cloud}
“Whenever I read,
I get airsick.”

{Yuffie}
“Oh yeah?”{PAUSE}“I'm the same way, so I can't say too much.”{PAUSE}“Damn! My plan failed.
Let's pick on {Red XIII} later
to let off steam.”

{Yuffie}
“Huh?”{PAUSE}“How would you even know?
You don't know how tough
it is…getting sick on boats and rides…”{PAUSE}“So, please…just leave me alone.”

{Cloud}
“I really do understand, {Yuffie}.
When I get sick on a flight, it's a real killer.”{PAUSE}“When I was in SOLDIER,
I completely forgot about my motion sickness.”

{Yuffie}
“Oh…”

{Yuffie}
“Isn't there any way to prevent this?”

{Cloud}
“Well, according to my research…”

{Cloud}
“First off, if you're nervous a lot,
you won't get sick.”{PAUSE}“But you can't always be nervous.”

{Cloud}
“With this much space, your best
bet is to move around
while you're riding.”{PAUSE}“It also might be a good idea to
stretch sometimes, too.”

{Cloud}
“But in SOLDIER, we spent
a lot of time in trucks.”{PAUSE}“That sucked!”

{Cloud}
“And there's one thing you mustn't do
when riding.”{PAUSE}“And that is…”

{Cloud}
“Read!”

{Yuffie}

{Cloud}
“Once you get sick, there's nothing
